description.zh-cn: 中国清朝晚期宗室，改革家、政治家、军事家、外交家和洋务派领袖。道光帝第六子，咸丰帝异母弟。
description.en: A prince of the Manchu Aisin Gioro clan and an important statesman during the late Qing dynasty in China. He was the sixth son of the Daoguang Emperor and the half-brother of the Xianfeng Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第八位皇帝，清朝定都北京后的第六位皇帝，奕䜣的父亲。
description.en: The eighth Emperor of the Qing dynasty, and the sixth Qing emperor to rule over China proper, father of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝的皇贵妃，咸丰帝的养母，恭亲王奕䜣的生母。
description.en: An imperial noble consort of the Daoguang Emperor, the adoptive mother of the Xianfeng Emperor, and the birth mother of Prince Gong, Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第九位皇帝，道光帝第四子，奕䜣的异母兄长。
description.en: The ninth Emperor of the Qing dynasty, the fourth son of the Daoguang Emperor, and the elder half-brother of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 清朝晚期的实际统治者，咸丰帝的配偶，同治帝的生母。
description.en: A Chinese empress dowager of the Qing dynasty who effectively controlled the Chinese government in the late Qing dynasty. She was a consort of the Xianfeng Emperor and the mother of the Tongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 咸丰帝的皇后，与慈禧太后一同垂帘听政，是奕䜣的重要政治盟友。
description.en: The empress consort of the Xianfeng Emperor. She served as regent of China during the minority of the Tongzhi Emperor and the Guangxu Emperor. She was an important political ally of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 1861年咸丰帝驾崩后，恭亲王奕䜣联合两宫皇太后发动的宫廷政变，夺取了顾命八大臣的权力。
description.en: A court coup launched in 1861 by Prince Gong and the two empress dowagers following the death of the Xianfeng Emperor, seizing power from the eight regents.

description.zh-cn: 咸丰帝临终前任命的八位辅佐同治帝的顾命大臣。
description.en: The eight regent ministers appointed by the Xianfeng Emperor on his deathbed to assist the young Tongzhi Emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝晚期由清廷一些官员倡导的，以“自强”、“求富”为口号，引进西方军事装备、机器生产和科学技术以挽救清朝统治的自救运动。
description.en: A period of institutional reforms initiated in China during the late Qing dynasty following a series of military defeats and concessions to foreign powers.

description.zh-cn: 清朝晚期负责外交、通商、海关、海防、邮政及各项洋务事宜的中央机构。
description.en: The government body in charge of foreign policy in imperial China during the late Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝中枢权力机构军机处的成员，是皇帝的主要决策顾问。
description.en: Members of the Grand Council, the most important policy-making body in the Qing dynasty, serving as chief advisors to the emperor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝晚期的一场大规模反清运动。
description.en: A massive rebellion and civil war that was waged in China between the Manchu-led Qing dynasty and the Hakka-led Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 1884年，慈禧太后借中法战争战事失利为由，罢免恭亲王奕䜣及其领导的整个军机处的事件。
description.en: An event in 1884 when Empress Dowager Cixi dismissed Prince Gong and his entire Grand Council, using the setbacks in the Sino-French War as a pretext.

description.zh-cn: 1860年清朝与英国、法国、俄国分别签订的一系列不平等条约。
description.en: A set of unequal treaties signed in 1860 between Qing China and the United Kingdom, France, and Russia.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第十位皇帝，咸丰帝独子，奕䜣的侄子。
description.en: The tenth Emperor of the Qing dynasty, the only son of the Xianfeng Emperor, and the nephew of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 顾命八大臣之首，在辛酉政变中被赐死。
description.en: The leader of the Eight Regent Ministers, who was forced to commit suicide in the Xinyou Coup.

description.zh-cn: 顾命八大臣之一，在辛酉政变中被赐死。
description.en: One of the Eight Regent Ministers, who was forced to commit suicide in the Xinyou Coup.

description.zh-cn: 顾命八大臣之一，在辛酉政变中被处决。
description.en: One of the Eight Regent Ministers, who was executed in the Xinyou Coup.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后心腹太监，因违背祖制出京被处死。
description.en: A favored court eunuch of Empress Dowager Cixi, executed for leaving the capital in violation of palace rules.

description.zh-cn: 清朝官员，时任山东巡抚，奉奕䜣之命处死了安德海。
description.en: A Qing official who, as Governor of Shandong, executed the eunuch An Dehai on Yixin's orders.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第十一位皇帝，奕䜣的侄子。
description.en: The 11th Emperor of the Qing dynasty, and a nephew of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝第七子，光绪帝生父，奕䜣的弟弟。
description.en: The seventh son of the Daoguang Emperor, the biological father of the Guangxu Emperor, and a younger brother of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年政治家，光绪帝的老师，因反对洋务运动而与奕䜣政见不合。
description.en: A Chinese statesman and Confucian scholar of the late Qing dynasty, tutor to the Guangxu Emperor, whose opposition to the Self-Strengthening Movement put him at odds with Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣长孙，第二代恭亲王。
description.en: Grandson of Yixin and the second Prince Gong.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣次子，溥伟的生父。
description.en: Second son of Yixin and biological father of Puwei.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣的嫡福晋，大学士桂良之女。
description.en: The primary consort of Yixin, and a daughter of the grand secretary Guiliang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝末年重臣，奕䜣的岳父。
description.en: An important minister in the late Qing dynasty and the father-in-law of Yixin.

en: Princess Rongshou of the First Rank

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣长女，慈禧太后养女。
description.en: The eldest daughter of Yixin and the adopted daughter of Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣是道光帝旻宁的第六子。
description.en: Yixin was the sixth son of the Daoguang Emperor, Minning.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣是孝静成皇后的亲生儿子。
description.en: Yixin was the biological son of Empress Xiao Jing Cheng.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣是咸丰帝奕𬣞的同父异母弟。
description.en: Yixin was the younger half-brother of the Xianfeng Emperor, Yizhu.

description.zh-cn: 道光帝选择传位于皇四子奕𬣞而非更有才干的奕䜣，并采取措施暗示奕䜣争储失败。
description.en: The Daoguang Emperor chose his fourth son Yizhu as successor over the more talented Yixin, and took measures to signal that Yixin's bid for the throne had failed.

description.zh-cn: 咸丰帝因奕䜣为其母请求太后封号一事感到不快，借故免去奕䜣的军机大臣等职务，导致兄弟反目。
description.en: The Xianfeng Emperor was displeased by Yixin's request for an empress dowager title for his mother and used it as a pretext to dismiss Yixin from his post as Grand Councilor, leading to their estrangement.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣与两宫皇太后（慈安、慈禧）密谋，联合发动辛酉政变，夺取了最高权力。
description.en: Yixin conspired with the two Empress Dowagers (Ci'an and Cixi) to launch the Xinyou Coup, seizing supreme power.

description.zh-cn: 在辛酉政变中联合，之后慈安太后长期支持奕䜣，制衡慈禧太后的权势。
description.en: They allied in the Xinyou Coup, and afterwards, Empress Dowager Ci'an consistently supported Yixin, balancing the power of Empress Dowager Cixi.

description.zh-cn: 因奕䜣功高震主，慈禧太后对他长期猜忌，并在1865年首次尝试罢免其职务，最终于1884年通过“甲申易枢”将其彻底逐出权力核心。
description.en: Due to Yixin's significant power and achievements, Empress Dowager Cixi grew suspicious of him, first attempting to dismiss him in 1865 and eventually removing him completely from the core of power in 1884 through the 'Jiashen Coup'.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣是辛酉政变的主要策划者和执行者，联合两宫皇太后推翻了顾命八大臣的统治。
description.en: Yixin was the main planner and executor of the Xinyou Coup, allying with the two Empress Dowagers to overthrow the rule of the Eight Regent Ministers.

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后与奕䜣、慈安太后密谋，联合发动了辛酉政变。
description.en: Empress Dowager Cixi conspired with Yixin and Empress Dowager Ci'an to jointly launch the Xinyou Coup.

description.zh-cn: 慈安太后与奕䜣、慈禧太后密谋，联合发动了辛酉政变。
description.en: Empress Dowager Ci'an conspired with Yixin and Empress Dowager Cixi to jointly launch the Xinyou Coup.

description.zh-cn: 辛酉政变将咸丰帝指定的顾命八大臣一举捉拿定罪，夺取了国家最高权力。
description.en: The Xinyou Coup led to the arrest and conviction of the Eight Regent Ministers appointed by the Xianfeng Emperor, seizing the highest state power.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣是洋务派的代表人物、主要发起者及领袖，倡导并主持洋务运动。
description.en: Yixin was a representative figure, main initiator, and leader of the Self-Strengthening Movement, advocating for and presiding over it.

description.zh-cn: 清廷采纳了奕䜣的建议，首次设立专门的外交机构——总理各国事务衙门，并由其担任首席大臣。
description.en: The Qing court adopted Yixin's proposal to establish the Zongli Yamen, the first dedicated foreign affairs office, with him serving as its head.

description.zh-cn: 在奕䜣等人主持下，清朝平息了太平天国运动。
description.en: Under the leadership of Yixin and others, the Qing dynasty suppressed the Taiping Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣受命与英法联军谈判议和，签署《北京条约》，结束了战争。
description.en: Yixin was ordered to negotiate peace with the Anglo-French forces, signing the Convention of Peking and ending the war.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣作为钦差大臣，代表清廷与英、法、俄等国签订了《北京条约》。
description.en: As the imperial commissioner, Yixin represented the Qing court in signing the Convention of Peking with Britain, France, and Russia.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣命山东巡抚丁宝祯将违制出京的慈禧心腹太监安德海捕拿并就地正法。
description.en: Yixin ordered Ding Baozhen, the Governor of Shandong, to capture and execute An Dehai, a favored eunuch of Cixi, for leaving the capital in violation of rules.

description.zh-cn: 同治帝因奕䜣劝谏其停止修治圆明园等事而痛斥他，并将其及其子撤职降级（后被两宫太后恢复）。
description.en: The Tongzhi Emperor berated Yixin for advising him to stop renovating the Old Summer Palace and other matters, and dismissed him and his son from their posts (later restored by the two empress dowagers).

description.zh-cn: 慈禧太后利用中法战争战败为借口，发动“甲申易枢”，罢免奕䜣及其整个军机处。
description.en: Using the defeat in the Sino-French War as a pretext, Empress Dowager Cixi initiated the 'Jiashen Coup' to dismiss Yixin and his entire Grand Council.

description.zh-cn: 在甲申易枢中，奕䜣被罢去一切职务，正式退出清朝的权力核心。
description.en: In the 'Jiashen Coup', Yixin was stripped of all his positions and formally exited the core of Qing power.

description.zh-cn: 中日甲午战争爆发后，慈禧碍于危机形势再度起用奕䜣，命其担任领班军机大臣等职。
description.en: After the outbreak of the First Sino-Japanese War, Cixi reappointed Yixin due to the crisis, making him the head of the Grand Council and other positions.

description.zh-cn: 晚年的奕䜣对光绪帝意图发动的维新变法运动极力抵制、屡加阻挠。
description.en: In his later years, Yixin strongly resisted and repeatedly obstructed the reform movement that the Guangxu Emperor intended to launch.

description.zh-cn: 奕䜣病逝前向光绪帝表达对翁同龢的反对之意，促使光绪帝罢黜了翁同龢。
description.en: Before his death, Yixin expressed his opposition to Weng Tonghe to the Guangxu Emperor, which prompted the emperor to dismiss Weng.

description.zh-cn: 瓜尔佳氏是奕䜣的嫡福晋（正妻）。
description.en: Lady Gūwalgiya was Yixin's primary consort.

description.zh-cn: 瓜尔佳氏是大学士桂良的庶女。
description.en: Lady Gūwalgiya was a daughter of the Grand Secretary Guiliang by a concubine.

description.zh-cn: 荣寿固伦公主是奕䜣的长女。
description.en: Princess Rongshou was the eldest daughter of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 载澂是奕䜣的长子。
description.en: Zaicheng was the eldest son of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 载滢是奕䜣的次子。
description.en: Zaiying was the second son of Yixin.

description.zh-cn: 溥伟是载滢的长子，后被过继给载澂。
description.en: Puwei was the eldest son of Zaiying and was later adopted by Zaicheng.

description.zh-cn: 溥伟被过继给已故的伯父载澂为嗣子，以承袭恭亲王爵位。
description.en: Puwei was adopted by his deceased uncle Zaicheng as his heir to inherit the title of Prince Gong.

description.zh-cn: 溥伟在祖父奕䜣去世后，承袭了恭亲王爵位。
description.en: After the death of his grandfather Yixin, Puwei inherited the title of Prince Gong.
